amendment.description: Amendment allocates $5 million to fund the digital scanning of health and benefits files to reduce the claims backlog being experienced by the VA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce then increase funding for General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
